
### dynamic linking: what to load? (1)  {.smaller}



* excerpt from <code>objdump -sx hello.exe</code>:
 
<pre><code>Program Header:
<it>...</it>
 <em>DYNAMIC</em> off    0x0000000000002e20 vaddr 0x0000000000403e20 paddr 0x0000000000403e20 align 2**3
         filesz 0x00000000000001d0 memsz 0x00000000000001d0 flags rw-
<it>...</it>
Dynamic Section:
  <em>NEEDED               libc.so.6</em>
  INIT                 0x0000000000401000
  ...
  STRTAB               0x0000000000400420
  ...
</code></pre>
 

* program header: identifies where dynamic linking info is
* dynamic linking info: array of key-value pairs 

   * needed libraries
   * constructor locations (‘INIT’)
   * string table location
   * …
